response.overview: Constantly online, never at home: A film about the crew of a cargo ship, their loneliness, and their attempt to escape it. For months at a time, far from home and family, they live in cramped quarters. An allegory for the homelessness of modern humanity, caught in the monotony between machine, sea, work, and sleep.
response.tagline: Constantly online, never at home: A film about the crew of a cargo ship, their loneliness, and their attempt to escape it.
response.title: MORE STAY MORE MONEY
